name: src/components/home/Home.js
content:
import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; /** * Displays landing page, * and ability to route to the signup page. * @type {Component} */ const Home = () => (
Sign Up

Take Control of your Career.

Complete short, actionable tasks guaranteed to get you further in your career, faster than ever.
Ready to get started? Take the short quiz below and get your personalized path today.

Get Started

I love how quickly I can do the tasks, and see progress.

— Mary Smith

The best investment I’ve made in myself in ages.

— Ben Johnson

); export default Home;

name: validatefields
description: Function used to validate that all fields are filled

name: validatePasswordMatch
description:
Function used to validate that the password
and re-type password fields match

name: validateEmail
description: Function used to validate an email address

name: validatePassword
description:
Function used to validate the password entered
is equal or more than 6 characters

name: login
description:
Login Function,
It take's the input credentials
and makes and authentication request.
Saves the token and user id, then navigates to the goals page.
Also, handles the display of login input errors.

name: signup
description:
Signup Function,
It take's the input credentials
and request to create a new user.
On creation of user, it makes a authentication request
and follows the login flow
Also, handles the display of signup input errors.

name: src/utils/auth.js
src/utils/helpers.js

content:
# ReachHigh (Enle - Test)
ReachHigh is building a personalized career plan to help early-stage Sales & Marketing professionals improve their skills, and advance in their careers.

## Current functionality
A user has the ability to:

1. Register for the platform.
1. Login if already registered.
2. Select personal goals
3. See a list of tasks based on selected goals
4. View a task
5. Indicate completed a task and see number of tasks left.

## Stack
* ReactJS (library for building user interfaces)
* NextJS (for Server-side rendering)
* MobX (for state management)
* Axios (http client)
* Eslint (For linting)
* Esdoc (full app wide documentation within 'documentation' folder).
* Jest (for testing).

## Genral Setup For Development

Clone this repository, install dependencies and start application:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:ekpo-d/reachHigh-fe.git
cd reachHigh-fe
yarn
```
Create a file called `.env` in the project root and add the project's environment variables based on the sample file.

```bash
yarn dev # For development, starts up eslint, jest and next JS.
```

## Other useful commands
* `yarn docs` - generates documentation
* `yarn lint` - runs linter (eslint)
* `yarn lint-test` - runs eslint and jest in parallel
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "reachhigh",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "watch": {
    "docs": "{pages,src/assets,components/common}/**/*.*"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "npm-run-all --parallel lint-test next-dev",
    "next-dev": "next dev",
    "build": "next build",
    "start": "next start",
    "docs-watch": "npm-watch docs",
    "test": "node ./node_modules/.bin/jest --watchAll",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "lint": "node_modules/.bin/esw",
    "lint-watch": "node_modules/.bin/esw --watch",
    "lint-test": "npm-run-all --parallel lint-watch test"
  },
  "jest": {
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "coverageReporters": [
      "json",
      "html"
    ],
    "testMatch": [
      "**/tests/**/*.js"
    ],
    "snapshotSerializers": [
      "./node_modules/enzyme-to-json/serializer"
    ],
    "modulePathIgnorePatterns": [
      "./tests/mocks"
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "7.1.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-decorators": "7.1.0",
    "@sentry/browser": "^5.7.1",
    "@zeit/next-sass": "^1.0.1",
    "@zeit/next-source-maps": "0.0.4-canary.1",
    "axios": "^0.19.0",
    "dotenv": "^8.2.0",
    "dotenv-webpack": "^1.7.0",
    "js-cookie": "^2.2.1",
    "mobx": "^5.14.0",
    "mobx-react": "5.4.4",
    "next": "9.1.1",
    "next-cookies": "^1.1.3",
    "node-sass": "^4.12.0",
    "react": "16.10.2",
    "react-dom": "16.10.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.3",
    "enzyme": "^3.9.0",
    "enzyme-adapter-react-16": "^1.12.1",
    "enzyme-react-16-adapter-setup": "^0.1.0",
    "enzyme-to-json": "^3.3.5",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-custom-theme": "^1.4.2",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.16.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^17.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.16.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.12.4",
    "eslint-watch": "^5.0.1",
    "jest": "^24.7.1",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "npm-watch": "^0.6.0"
  }
}
